title: Supported By Big Oil, Data Center Boom Faces Growing Local Opposition
description:
Fossil fuel companies like Exxon see powering data centers as an important new revenue source and are making promises they can't keep.

The post Supported By Big Oil, Data Center Boom Faces Growing Local Opposition appeared first on CleanTechnica.
